# archestra_dual_llm_config (Resource)

Manages a Dual LLM Security Config in Archestra.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `main_agent_prompt` (String) Prompt for the main agent
- `quarantined_agent_prompt` (String) Prompt for the quarantined agent
- `summary_prompt` (String) Prompt for the summary

### Optional

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the dual LLM config is enabled
- `max_rounds` (Number) Maximum number of rounds

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the config was created
- `id` (String) Dual LLM Config identifier
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the config was last updated
